method.name: GET
method.doc: This API provides a list of all statically configured IP addresses on the appliances. Any static IP address (or hostname that resolves to an IP address) on this appliance can be used as a cluster identifier. Valid hostnames are not listed by this API. Hostnames should be validated using the "Validate a cluster identifier" API.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: The request was successful. A list of all static IP addresses is returned.

representation.name: cluster_id_list_entry
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: type
param.doc: The type of IP address, 'management' or 'application'.
